description: Owned the roadmap for a new B2B Budgeting Module; conducted 15+ stakeholder interviews to define requirements, reducing budget variance tracking errors by 25%.
Collaborated with engineering to build a real time scheduling engine that alerts managers of delays; improved project timeline accuracy by 15%.
Designed and shipped an automated invoice rejection workflow, reducing accounts payable processing time by 12 hours per week.
Revamped the user onboarding flow for the internal SaaS tool, increasing Day-1 activation rates for site engineers from 60% to 85%.
Led the end to end digitization of the QC process, replacing manual logs with a mobile first Material Inspection Suite; reduced inspection turnaround time by 20%.
Managed the agile development lifecycle for Vudio.ai, an AI powered shoppable video tool; facilitated sprint planning for a team of 6 devs.
Owned the PRD for core engagement features of an AI powered CMS; launched a Smart Connection algorithm that personalized content recommendations, driving an 18% increase in user retention.
Acted as the primary bridge between design and engineering, reducing design to dev handoff friction and cutting QA bug reports by 20%.
Founded and bootstrapped a media content platform to 100,000+ impressions and 1,000+ app downloads within 6 months via organic SEO.
Negotiated and executed the strategic acquisition of the platform by a private player in 2025 after demonstrating 30% MoM user growth.
Led the roadmap for the mobile app, prioritizing features based on user feedback, resulting in a 4.5/5 star rating on launch.
Conducted funnel analysis on a Matrimony App's registration flow; identified friction points and designed a streamlined 3-step onboarding process.
Pivoted product strategy to explore a debate-to-date revenue model; designed a gamified matchmaking feature that increased average session time by 30%.

profile.summary: Product Management professional with a track record of building and scaling products, including a successful startup exit. Experienced in B2B modules, AI-powered CMS, and user onboarding optimization.
profile.title: Product Management Intern

projects.description: Built a loyal audience of 3.5k+ subscribers and surpassed 1 million+ views in just one year by creating engaging content on cryptocurrency and investment strategies.
projects.title: Crypto currency & Investment Influencer

projects.description: Published an insightful article titled "The Decline of Funding for Startups in India 2023" for FinNomal Magazine, demonstrating expertise in the startup ecosystem.
